name: Anomaly Warzone Earth Mobile Campaign
description: Anomaly Warzone Earth Mobile Campaign continues Steam's Anomaly Warzone Earth in extra 15-level campaign. Originally released on mobile devices, the campaign is brought to Steam for PC, Mac and Linux exclusively in Anomaly Bundle. AWE Mobile Campaign turns tower defense on its head.
minimum_requirements: Минимальные: ОС: Windows XP SP3 (32 bit) / Vista Процессор: Intel(R) Core(TM)2 Duo 2.1 Ghz or equivalent Оперативная память: 1024 MB ОЗУ Видеокарта: GeForce 8800 or equivalent DirectX: Версии 9.0c Место на диске: 400 MB Звуковая карта: Integrated

reviews.review_text: More of a collector game if you like the series because it really doesn't offer anything new other than some missions, this is the mobile version of the first anomaly, it's really basic. They actually gave steam keys for humblebundle buyers.
Its one of the games ,where you feel like Albert Einstein.You do impossible stuff and just ♥♥♥♥ up everything whats in your way.You literally are the god in this one.
i like this game but map is not working.... like always linux got so problems ..........
well i get this game for free but this still a good stragety game,100% recomeded if you can get it free
*inserts random review to get the badge*
This game will only be good on Mobile, PC version is weak.
